name: SUSTech Pokémon
description:
This is a project which is developed during the CS309 Object Oriented Design and Analysis course in Southern University of Science and Technology.

ATTENTION!!!

This game has no any commercial value.

It is only created for learning and communication.

All the art materials are obtained from online.

If infringed, it will be deleted.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi, adventurer. It seems like you got hurt in SUSTech... Nevermind, let pokemons help you! Get your Pokemon
  • Select different colleges in SUSTech! Different guradian pokemons are responsible for different colleges!
  • Use your PokeBall to summon many pokemons!
  • Cultivate your pokemons, make them stronger, and take them together in the adventure in SUSTech!
  • Upgrade your pokemons to let them learn more skills!
Have an excited Adventure in SUSTech
  • Over 9 large maps that allow you to explore environment in SUSTech!
  • Four developer will guide around the SUSTech!
  • Opps, there might be some smell of danger...
  • Don't worry, pokemons will help you!
Encounter Monster? Battle!
  • Similar battle system as the classic Pokemon game
  • Manage your own pokemon team and their skills!
  • When you beat monsters, you will be rewarded!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't hesitate, let's go!
